r.s: Savvy_Turbo adds output caching to Savvy rendered content
r.d: Savvy content can be cached for faster rendering. Savvy_Turbo allows rendered content to be cached, and recalled for subsequent requests. For basic use, instead of creating a new Savvy object, create a Savvy_Turbo object. In models you'd like to have cached, implement the CacheableInterface.
r.n:
Package Savvy_Turbo release notes for version 0.1.0.
Package Savvy_Turbo API release notes for version 0.1.0.
